amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the TARP Special Inspector General has oversight power over any action tied to the distribution of TARP funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-3 to clarify that the TARP Special Inspector General has oversight power over any actions taken by Treasury under this legislation that he deems appropriate, with certain exceptions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
